thread.title: Letícia M.
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Letícia M.

author: Letícia M.
title: Letícia M.
text: This wig is beautiful! The hair is soft is wonderful. After I washed the curls get looser; As well as the Brazilian style. Best wig I bought so far. Super delicate. I just thought it might have more hair. I want to buy more of this model. Shipping is wonderful: cheap. And the attendance of the store also, always answer the questions.
